@Preamble(description="Package defining all utilities in charge of Data Access")

Package com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.common.dao

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CloudDao
    Generic Data Access Object (DAO) definition for interacting with the Cloud.
    CreateDao<T extends SdkModel>
    Data access object (DAO) definition for create persistence actions.
    CrudDao<T extends SdkModel>
    Data access object definition of create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) persistence actions in the Cloud.
    DeleteDao<T extends SdkModel>
    Data access object (DAO) definition for delete persistence actions.
    ModelDao<T extends SdkModel>
    Data Access Object definition for dealing with data objects (Models) defined in the Cloud.
    ModelListDao<T extends SdkModel,U extends ListOptions>
    Data access object definition for listing models using pagination.
    ReadDao<T extends SdkModel>
    Data access object (DAO) definition for read persistence actions.
    UpdateDao<T extends SdkModel>
    Data access object (DAO) definition for update persistence actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCloudDao
    Abstract definition of a Cloud Data Access Object.
    AbstractModelDao<T extends SdkModel>
    Abstract definition of a Model Data Access Object.
    AbstractModelListDao<T extends SdkModel,U extends ListOptions>  
    DaoProvider
